item.title: summer holidays and teenage concept - teenage girl in sunglasses

Ordered List

How to publish your WordPress Theme:
  1. Think of an awesome idea
  2. Actually create the Theme
    1. Design Process
    2. Download a kick starter framework (_underscore)
    3. Plan, Plan, Plan
    4. Code
  3. Documentation
  4. Set-up demo contents and live demo
  5. Release
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_column_text]

UnorderedList

How to publish your WordPress Theme:
  • A glass of coffee
  • Umbrella (it's raining)
  • My pet dog
  • My personalised mug
  • My 13' MacBook Pro
    • Must be fully re-charged.
    • Must be in case
    • Must have a magic mouse.
  • My backpack (ofcourse)
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Alerts Message Box
item.dc:creator: cecelia
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Alertprovides contextual feedback messages for typical user actions with the handful of available and flexible alert messages (reference).

Font icon libraries are available to when you add alert box to the page. There are literally over 1,000 amount of icons to choose from. While this has a lot of icons, it doesn't slow you down. Thats a lot of icon to choose from XD.

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: dunhakdis
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Home Version 1
item.dc:creator: dunhakdis
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row el_class="wide"][vc_column width="1/1"][rev_slider_vc alias="social-slider"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_icon type="entypo" icon_fontawesome="fa fa-adjust" icon_openiconic="vc-oi vc-oi-dial" icon_typicons="typcn typcn-adjust-brightness" icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-book-open" icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-heart" color="custom" background_color="grey" size="xl" align="left" custom_color="#2ecc71" css_animation="top-to-bottom"][vc_column_text css_animation="left-to-right"]
Complete Social Network

Klein is the mostinnovative & complete social networking theme for WordPress & BuddyPress. Its worth a buck.

[/vc_column_text][vc_icon type="entypo" icon_fontawesome="fa fa-adjust" icon_openiconic="vc-oi vc-oi-dial" icon_typicons="typcn typcn-adjust-brightness" icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-bell" icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-heart" color="custom" background_color="grey" size="xl" align="left" custom_color="#27ae60" css_animation="top-to-bottom"][vc_column_text css_animation="left-to-right"]
Popular Plug-ins Supported
BuddyPress, WooCommerce, bbPress, Paid Membership Pro, RT Media, etc. We made sure to support those plugin to suit your needs.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_icon type="entypo" icon_fontawesome="fa fa-adjust" icon_openiconic="vc-oi vc-oi-dial" icon_typicons="typcn typcn-adjust-brightness" icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-tools" icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-heart" color="custom" background_color="grey" size="xl" align="left" custom_color="#9b59b6" css_animation="top-to-bottom"][vc_column_text css_animation="bottom-to-top"]
Clean Design

We feature flat design trend in this theme. 2015 is stillan era of flat and minimal designs. We see to ittomake sure itsstay updated.

[/vc_column_text][vc_icon type="entypo" icon_fontawesome="fa fa-adjust" icon_openiconic="vc-oi vc-oi-dial" icon_typicons="typcn typcn-adjust-brightness" icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-docs" icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-heart" color="custom" background_color="grey" size="xl" align="left" custom_color="#8e44ad" css_animation="top-to-bottom"][vc_column_text css_animation="bottom-to-top"]
Drag & Drop
Klein supports drag and drop plug-in called Visual Composer. This plug-in comes for free when you get a copy of Klein.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_icon type="entypo" icon_fontawesome="fa fa-adjust" icon_openiconic="vc-oi vc-oi-dial" icon_typicons="typcn typcn-adjust-brightness" icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-map" icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-heart" color="custom" background_color="grey" size="xl" align="left" custom_color="#e74c3c" css_animation="top-to-bottom"][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left"]
Profile Cover Photos

First in ThemeForest. Klein allows unique profile cover photos to every member and group.A must have feature.

[/vc_column_text][vc_icon type="entypo" icon_fontawesome="fa fa-adjust" icon_openiconic="vc-oi vc-oi-dial" icon_typicons="typcn typcn-adjust-brightness" icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-feather" icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-heart" color="custom" background_color="grey" size="xl" align="left" custom_color="#c0392b" css_animation="top-to-bottom"][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left"]
First Class Support
Klein is directly supported by the developer. Cutting the amount of support time needed for the problem to be solved.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1423558369573{background-color: #ecf0f1 !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1423546297623{padding-right: 35px !important;}"][vc_column_text css_animation="left-to-right"]

Responsive Social Components

Completely draggable social components that will allowyou to add members, groups, activity streams anywhere in your pages. Very innovative and user friendly.

[/vc_column_text][vc_button2 title="Members Page" align="right" style="round" color="green" size="md"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="172" alignment="right" border_color="grey" img_link_large="" img_link_target="_self" css_animation="right-to-left" img_size="full"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1423557967960{background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]

Discover Community

[/vc_column_text][gears_bp_groups_carousel_2 type="active" max_item="12" max_slides="7" min_slides="1" slide_margin="20" item_width="223"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1423546672211{background-color: #ecf0f1 !important;}"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]

Our Lovely Members

[/vc_column_text][gears_bp_members_carousel_2 type="active" max_item="10" max_slides="7" min_slides="1" slide_margin="20" item_width="320"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="5/12" css=".vc_custom_1423552263056{margin-top: 40px !important;}"][vc_single_image image="175" border_color="grey" img_link_large="" img_link_target="_self" img_size="full" css_animation="left-to-right"][/vc_column][vc_column width="7/12"][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1423549502706{margin-bottom: 25px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="2/12"][vc_icon type="typicons" icon_fontawesome="fa fa-adjust" icon_openiconic="vc-oi vc-oi-dial" icon_typicons="typcn typcn-map" icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-note" icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-heart" color="violet" background_style="rounded-outline" background_color="violet" size="lg" align="left" css_animation="left-to-right"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="10/12"][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left"]
Built with Passion
Klein is not just another WordPress theme.A lot of effort has come into releasing this theme just to make you happy :)[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1423549494136{margin-bottom: 25px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="2/12"][vc_icon type="typicons" icon_fontawesome="fa fa-adjust" icon_openiconic="vc-oi vc-oi-dial" icon_typicons="typcn typcn-scissors-outline" icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-note" icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-heart" color="juicy_pink" background_style="rounded-outline" background_color="juicy_pink" size="lg" align="left" css_animation="left-to-right"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="10/12"][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left"]
Save your Time and Energy
Create website easily. Spend more of your time planning your business. Having a good WordPress theme can save you a lot of troubles.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1423549485699{margin-bottom: 25px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="2/12"][vc_icon type="typicons" icon_fontawesome="fa fa-adjust" icon_openiconic="vc-oi vc-oi-dial" icon_typicons="typcn typcn-waves-outline" icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-note" icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-heart" color="sandy_brown" background_style="rounded-outline" background_color="sandy_brown" size="lg" align="left" css_animation="left-to-right"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="10/12"][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left"]
Awesomeness by Nature
What's more awesome is what you can do with Klein. You can almost do any layouts your would like.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1423552770139{background-color: #ecf0f1 !important;}"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]

Whatcha Say?

What Existing Customers Say About Klein and Why They Love it

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1423553623817{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1424919202054{padding-top: 35px !important;padding-right: 35px !important;padding-bottom: 35px !important;padding-left: 35px !important;background-color: #34495e !important;}"][vc_column_text]Excellent customer support to go with the excellent theme. Extremely happy with the product![/vc_column_text][vc_column_text] Happy Customer / ThemeForest.net[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1423553606852{padding-top: 35px !important;padding-right: 35px !important;padding-bottom: 35px !important;padding-left: 35px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}"][vc_column_text]Excellent theme. I purchased it on Feb 21st -- and have been very busy (in my spare time), modifying it and experimenting with the different features. Thank you![/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1425333866903{background-color: #ffffff !important;}"] Happy Customer / ThemeForest.net[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1423553623817{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1424919211177{padding-top: 35px !important;padding-right: 35px !important;padding-bottom: 35px !important;padding-left: 35px !important;background-color: #34495e !important;}"][vc_column_text]So far so good when it comes to design, features, and customization. There is a child theme that comes with the Klein theme. Thats what Im using so I can customize i[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text] Happy Customer / ThemeForest.net[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1423553606852{padding-top: 35px !important;padding-right: 35px !important;padding-bottom: 35px !important;padding-left: 35px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}"][vc_column_text]Very few themes are created bug-free. Its always good to have a strong support team to be there for the customers when issues arise. I think your customers will be happy to know you have their best interest. Thanks for working to resolve my issues.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1425333929305{background-color: #ffffff !important;}"] Happy Customer / ThemeForest.net[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_cta_button2 h2="Ready to Start Your Own Social Media?" h4="Get Klein and Save Tons of Your Time!" style="rounded" txt_align="left" title="Rock & Roll!" btn_style="rounded" color="green" size="md" position="right" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fthemeforest.net%2Fitem%2Fklein-a-nittygritty-community-theme%2F5418518||" accent_color="#ecf0f1"]Klein is an innovative WordPress theme built to support BuddyPress, bbPress, and WooCommerce out of the box. Perfect for a website that interacts with a lot of users. Now your members can create profiles, send messages, add connections, or share whats happening in their life. Collaborate through forums or sell any products you have.[/vc_cta_button2][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1423557340183{padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-color: #ecf0f1 !important;}"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text el_class="container-compress"]

Small Improvements that Matter!

This is just the beginning. Discover Klein by playing with this demo website. If you have any suggestions, kindly e-mail me via TF profile. You can also sell any items through WooCommerce.

[/vc_column_text][recent_products per_page="3" columns="3"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Example Page: 2 Columns Right Sidebar
item.dc:creator: dunhakdis
item.content:encoded:
The European languages are members of the same family. Their separate existence is a myth. For science, music, sport, etc, Europe uses the same vocabulary. The languages only differ in their grammar, their pronunciation and their most common words. Everyone realizes why a new common language would be desirable: one could refuse to pay expensive translators.

Headings 2

The languages only differ in their grammar, their pronunciation and their most common words.Everyone realizes why a new common language would be desirable: one could refuse to pay expensive translators. To achieve this, it would be necessary to have uniform grammar, pronunciation and more common words.  
Blockquote
To achieve this, it would be necessary to have uniform grammar, pronunciation and more common words. If several languages coalesce, the grammar of the resulting language is more simple and regular than that of the individual languages.
The new common language will be more simple and regular than the existing European languages. It will be as simple as Occidental; in fact, it will be Occidental.

Headings 3

To an English person, it will seem like simplified English, as a skeptical Cambridge friend of mine told me what Occidental is. The European languages are members of the same family. Their separate existence is a myth. For science, music, sport, etc, Europe uses the same vocabulary.
Headings 5
The languages only differ in their grammar, their pronunciation and their most common words. Everyone realizes why a new common language would be desirable: one could refuse to pay expensive translators. To

The new common language will be more simple and regular than the existing European languages. It will be as simple as Occidental; in fact, it will be Occidental.

Headings 3

To an English person, it will seem like simplified English, as a skeptical Cambridge friend of mine told me what Occidental is. The European languages are members of the same family. Their separate existence is a myth. For science, music, sport, etc, Europe uses the same vocabulary.
Headings 5
The languages only differ in their grammar, their pronunciation and their most common words. Everyone realizes why a new common language would be desirable: one could refuse to pay expensive translators. To

item.title: Moov Fitness Tracker Adds 7 Minute + Workout Coach
item.dc:creator: dunhakdis
item.content:encoded:
Three years ago, wearables were the new, new thing. There were only a few wearable fitness trackers available on the market, and each was exciting and fresh compared with familiar technology like smartphones and tablets. Today, you cant bat an eyelash without spotting a Jawbone Up or a FitBit or a Garmin. Which is why each of these products needs something special. With Moov, the fitness tracker that passed its $40k funding goal in just over an hour, has today added a new feature to set it apart.

item.title: MyTwinPlace Is Like Airbnb For Housing Swaps
item.dc:creator: dunhakdis
item.content:encoded: If you like to travel youve probably heard of Airbnb, even if youve never used it. That lodgings marketplace enables users to rent out their homes to others. But what if you just wanted to swap apartments with someone who lived in a city you wanted to visit? To solve that problem a startup called MyTwinPlace has built a marketplace for housing swaps. MyTwinPlace is trying to connect users who want close to free accommodations in cities they plan to travel to. But to do so, users need to also make their homes available to others. Even so, finding dates times and cities that match up isnt always possible, which is why MyTwinPlace has come up with a few interesting ways to get around those problems. Operating a marketplace is notoriously difficult, just in terms of making sure that theres both enough supply and demand available to make it worth everyones time. On the supply side, MyTwinPlace hopes to capitalize on the prevalence of existing marketplaces to help boost the number of listings available. Article:http://techcrunch.com/2015/02/24/mytwinplace/
item.excerpt:encoded: If you like to travel youve probably heard of Airbnb, even if youve never used it. That lodgings marketplace enables users to rent out their homes to others. But what if you just wanted to swap apartments with someone who lived in a city you wanted to visit?

item.title: Planet Under Pressure: a new climate security agenda.
item.dc:creator: dunhakdis
item.content:encoded:
Larger and richer populations are increasing the pressure on natural resources, further exacerbated by the immediate problem of a changing climate, with serious impacts on water, energy, and food security.The close interdependencies between water, energy and food are multiplying these threatsin diverse countries and regions demonstrating thatclimate security will be an issue for all.An integrated 'nexus approach' is helping decision-makers tomanage shared resources and achieve truly sustainable development.

Planet Under Pressure is the second film Moth Collective has produced for the Global Canopy Programme, a tropical forest think tank working to demonstrate the scientific, political and businesscase for safeguarding tropical forests as natural capital. Directed and Designed by Moth Collective Written by Global Canopy Programme Sound Design: Joe Tate Animation: Marcus Armitage, Joe Bichard, Daniel Chester, Marie-Margaux Tsakiri-Scanatovits Voice Over: Yolanda Kakabadse Client: Global Canopy Programme Article:https://vimeo.com/channels/staffpicks/117910068

item.title: Launching The Players Tribune: Derek Jeter, Budding Media Mogul
item.dc:creator: dunhakdis
item.content:encoded:
Since Derek Jeter took his finalbow in Yankee pinstripes last fall, the former shortstop has been working to reinvent himself in the media world.

With his vision of giving players a more robust and unfettered way of communicating with their fans, Jeter hopes to create a new kind of relationship between athletes and the fans thatfollowthem with his new companyThe Players Tribune. Jeters foray into the future of media, which includes partnerships with AOL (TechCrunchs poppa bear) and the Blue Jeans Network comes as the lines between investors, athletes and entrepreneurs continues to blur. Billionaire investor Mark Cuban has the Mavericks, while former Maverick Steve Nash has a venture fund. NY Knicks superstar Carmelo Anthony is among the latest to launch a fund, with his Melo7 Tech Partners already committing capital to several startups.
item.excerpt:encoded:
Since Derek Jeter took his final bow in Yankee pinstripes last fall, the former shortstop has been working to reinvent himself in the media world.
With his vision of giving players a more robust and unfettered way of communicating with their fans, Jeter hopes to create a new kind of relationship between athletes and the fans that follow them with his new company The Players Tribune.

item.title: Bringing Inbox To Google Apps For Work Customers
item.dc:creator: dunhakdis
item.content:encoded: Last Fall, Google started its (slow) rollout of Inbox, itscompletely redesigned email experiencefor Gmail on the web and mobile. Even today, its still an invite-only service (butinvites are pretty easy to come by these days). Until now, however, it wasnt possible to use Inbox with Google Apps for Work accounts. Thats changing today. Google hasnow launched an invite process that allows Google Apps for Work admins to request access to the service. Once again, Google is going with a very slow rollout. This is going to be an early adopter program and company admins that already use Google Apps for Work will haveto email Google to request an invite (inboxforwork@google.com). Once they get that and have Inbox enabled for their companies their users will be able to use it. Google will send out the first invites next month.
item.excerpt:encoded:
Last Fall, Google started its (slow) rollout of Inbox, its completely redesigned email experience for Gmail on the web and mobile. Even today, its still an invite-only service (but invites are pretty easy to come by these days).
Until now, however, it wasnt possible to use Inbox with Google Apps for Work accounts. Thats changing today. Google has now launched an invite process that allows Google Apps for Work admins to request access to the service.

Donec eu libero sit amet quam egestas semper. Aenean ultricies mi vitae est. Mauris placerat eleifend leo.

item.title: Woo Ninja
item.dc:creator: wooteam
item.content:encoded: Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et malesuada fames ac turpis egestas. Vestibulum tortor quam, feugiat vitae, ultricies eget, tempor sit amet, ante. Donec eu libero sit amet quam egestas semper. Aenean ultricies mi vitae est. Mauris placerat eleifend leo.
item.excerpt:encoded: Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et malesuada fames ac turpis egestas. Vestibulum tortor quam, feugiat vitae, ultricies eget, tempor sit amet, ante. Donec eu libero sit amet quam egestas semper. Aenean ultricies mi vitae est. Mauris placerat eleifend leo.

item.title: Patient Ninja
item.dc:creator: wooteam
item.content:encoded: Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et malesuada fames ac turpis egestas. Vestibulum tortor quam, feugiat vitae, ultricies eget, tempor sit amet, ante. Donec eu libero sit amet quam egestas semper. Aenean ultricies mi vitae est. Mauris placerat eleifend leo.
item.excerpt:encoded: Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et malesuada fames ac turpis egestas. Vestibulum tortor quam, feugiat vitae, ultricies eget, tempor sit amet, ante. Donec eu libero sit amet quam egestas semper. Aenean ultricies mi vitae est. Mauris placerat eleifend leo.

item.content:encoded: Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et malesuada fames ac turpis egestas. Vestibulum tortor quam, feugiat vitae, ultricies eget, tempor sit amet, ante. Donec eu libero sit amet quam egestas semper. Aenean ultricies mi vitae est. Mauris placerat eleifend leo.

item.title: Woo Logo
item.dc:creator: wooteam
item.content:encoded: Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et malesuada fames ac turpis egestas. Vestibulum tortor quam, feugiat vitae, ultricies eget, tempor sit amet, ante. Donec eu libero sit amet quam egestas semper. Aenean ultricies mi vitae est. Mauris placerat eleifend leo.
item.excerpt:encoded: Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et malesuada fames ac turpis egestas. Vestibulum tortor quam, feugiat vitae, ultricies eget, tempor sit amet, ante. Donec eu libero sit amet quam egestas semper. Aenean ultricies mi vitae est. Mauris placerat eleifend leo.

item.title: Ship Your Idea
item.dc:creator: wooteam
item.content:encoded: Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et malesuada fames ac turpis egestas. Vestibulum tortor quam, feugiat vitae, ultricies eget, tempor sit amet, ante. Donec eu libero sit amet quam egestas semper. Aenean ultricies mi vitae est. Mauris placerat eleifend leo.

item.dc:creator: siobhan
item.content:encoded: But I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born and I will give you a complete account of the system, and expound the actual teachings of the great explorer of the truth, the master-builder of human happiness.

item.dc:creator: picabo
item.content:encoded: No one rejects, dislikes, or avoids pleasure itself, because it is pleasure, but because those who do not know how to pursue pleasure rationally encounter consequences that are extremely painful.

item.dc:creator: monta
item.content:encoded: No one rejects, dislikes, or avoids pleasure itself, because it is pleasure, but because those who do not know how to pursue pleasure rationally encounter consequences that are extremely painful.

item.dc:creator: michellie
item.content:encoded: But who has any right to find fault with a man who chooses to enjoy a pleasure that has no annoying consequences, or one who avoids a pain that produces no resultant pleasure?

item.dc:creator: ron
item.content:encoded: On the other hand, we denounce with righteous indignation and dislike men who are so beguiled and demoralized by the charms of pleasure of the moment, so blinded by desire, that they cannot foresee the pain and trouble that are bound to ensue; and equal blame belongs to those who fail in their duty through weakness of will, which is the same as saying through shrinking from toil and pain.

item.dc:creator: matraca
item.content:encoded: These cases are perfectly simple and easy to distinguish. In a free hour, when our power of choice is untrammelled and when nothing prevents our being able to do what we like best, every pleasure is to be welcomed and every pain avoided.

item.dc:creator: malivai
item.content:encoded: But in certain circumstances and owing to the claims of duty or the obligations of business it will frequently occur that pleasures have to be repudiated and annoyances accepted. The wise man therefore always holds in these matters to this principle of selection: he rejects pleasures to secure other greater pleasures, or else he endures pains to avoid worse pains.

item.dc:creator: kiki
item.content:encoded: But I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born and I will give you a complete account of the system, and expound the actual teachings of the great explorer of the truth, the master-builder of human happiness.

item.dc:creator: chynna
item.content:encoded: No one rejects, dislikes, or avoids pleasure itself, because it is pleasure, but because those who do not know how to pursue pleasure rationally encounter consequences that are extremely painful.

item.dc:creator: antawn
item.content:encoded: Nor again is there anyone who loves or pursues or desires to obtain pain of itself, because it is pain, but because occasionally circumstances occur in which toil and pain can procure him some great pleasure. To take a trivial example, which of us ever undertakes laborious physical exercise, except to obtain some advantage from it?

item.dc:creator: dunhakdis
item.content:encoded: But who has any right to find fault with a man who chooses to enjoy a pleasure that has no annoying consequences, or one who avoids a pain that produces no resultant pleasure?

item.dc:creator: stephen

But who has any right to find fault with a man who chooses to enjoy a pleasure that has no annoying consequences, or one who avoids a pain that produces no resultant pleasure?

item.title: No one rejects, dislikes, or avoids pleasure itself.
item.dc:creator: dunhakdis
item.content:encoded:
But I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born and I will give you a complete account of the system, and expound the actual teachings of the great explorer of the truth, the master-builder of human happiness.
No one rejects, dislikes, or avoids pleasure itself, because it is pleasure, but because those who do not know how to pursue pleasure rationally encounter consequences that are extremely painful.

item.title: Just Another Dummy Forum Topic Here
item.dc:creator: antawn
item.content:encoded:
Nor again is there anyone who loves or pursues or desires to obtain pain of itself, because it is pain, but because occasionally circumstances occur in which toil and pain can procure him some great pleasure.
To take a trivial example, which of us ever undertakes laborious physical exercise, except to obtain some advantage from it?
But who has any right to find fault with a man who chooses to enjoy a pleasure that has no annoying consequences, or one who avoids a pain that produces no resultant pleasure?

item.title: These cases are perfectly simple and easy to distinguish
item.dc:creator: dunhakdis
item.content:encoded:
On the other hand, we denounce with righteous indignation and dislike men who are so beguiled and demoralized by the charms of pleasure of the moment, so blinded by desire, that they cannot foresee the pain and trouble that are bound to ensue; and equal blame belongs to those who fail in their duty through weakness of will, which is the same as saying through shrinking from toil and pain.
These cases are perfectly simple and easy to distinguish. In a free hour, when our power of choice is untrammelled and when nothing prevents our being able to do what we like best, every pleasure is to be welcomed and every pain avoided.

item.title: Equal blame belongs to those who fail in their duty
item.dc:creator: dunhakdis
item.content:encoded:
On the other hand, we denounce with righteous indignation and dislike men who are so beguiled and demoralized by the charms of pleasure of the moment, so blinded by desire, that they cannot foresee the pain and trouble that are bound to ensue; and equal blame belongs to those who fail in their duty through weakness of will, which is the same as saying through shrinking from toil and pain.
These cases are perfectly simple and easy to distinguish. In a free hour, when our power of choice is untrammelled and when nothing prevents our being able to do what we like best, every pleasure is to be welcomed and every pain avoided.

item.title: The wise man therefore always holds in these matters
item.dc:creator: dunhakdis
item.content:encoded:
But in certain circumstances and owing to the claims of duty or the obligations of business it will frequently occur that pleasures have to be repudiated and annoyances accepted.
The wise man therefore always holds in these matters to this principle of selection: he rejects pleasures to secure other greater pleasures, or else he endures pains to avoid worse pains.
